## findTileCoordinates() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Find the locations of a tile.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function findTileCoordinates(board: GameBoard, tileId: TileId): HexCoordinate[];
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

</td><td>

The game board to search.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

tileId


</td><td>

[TileId](./hive-lib.tileid.md)


</td><td>

The tile id to search for.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)<!-- -->\[\]

The locations of the tile on the board.

## Remarks

If more than one of the tile are in the same stack, the stack's coorindate will only be included once.
